title: AzureTRE configuration file
description: This document contains all the configuration needed to deploy and setup AzureTRE.

location.description: The Azure location (region) for all resources.

mgmt_resource_group_name.description: The shared resource group for all management resources, including the storage account.

mgmt_storage_account_name.description: The name of the storage account to hold the Terraform state and other deployment artifacts.

terraform_state_container_name.description: Optional. The name of the blob container to hold the Terraform state. Default value is `tfstate`.

acr_name.description: A globally unique name for the Azure Container Registry (ACR) that will be created to store deployment images.

arm_subscription_id.description: The Azure subscription ID for all resources.

enable_swagger.description: Determines whether the Swagger interface for the API will be available.

aad_tenant_id.description: Tenant id against which auth is performed.

auto_workspace_app_registration.description: This identity is used to manage other AAD applications that it owns. Read more about it here: docs/tre-admins/auth.md

auto_workspace_group_creation.description: This identity can create security groups aligned to each applciation role. Read more about it here: docs/tre-admins/auth.md

application_admin_client_id.description: This client will administer AAD Applications for TRE.

application_admin_client_secret.description: Secret to client which will administer AAD Applications for TRE

test_account_client_id.description: This is the app that will run the tests for you.

test_account_client_secret.description: This is the secret to an app that will run the tests for you

workspace_api_client_id.description: Workspace AD Application. This will be created for you for future use - when creating workspaces.

workspace_api_client_secret.description: Workspace AD Application secret. This will be created for you for future use - when creating workspaces.
